topics.body:
"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54c82b5b6368722792550900#post_54c82b5b6368722792550900
There's this guy that's infamous around the internet for Loving Gaogaigar like It's a Deep Sci-fi classic but hating the shit out of every mecha show ever. (His name is clawshrimpy if you want to look for his famous arguments.)

His favorite Target is TTGL.

He goes on and on about how It's "Anti-thinking Schlock" and stuff like that.

While I love Gaogaigar, I admit that It's no masterpiece. And Gurren lagann actually has a lot of thought put behind it when you really look at it. (With Gaogaigar he keeps saying to "Look past the screaming" But he can't seem to do the same with TTGL.)

topics.body:
"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54c82b5b6368722792550900#post_54c82b5b6368722792550900
CLENCH THOSE THIS! 


"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54c82b6d63687259fb330000#post_54c82b6d63687259fb330000
Well I have played ALL the Paper Mario games except Sticker Star.

What I'm hearing is there is no reason to fight anyone in that game, they took the RPG function out, And for some stupid reason Miyamoto just told the people that He didn't want _*ANY*_ original Character in the game.

Being someone who LOVES THE HELL out of paper Mario just hearing that there are no partner's in that game made me uninterested cuz one of the things that made Paper Mario was the inclusion of partners. 

I liked characters like Goombella and all those other guys.

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54c82f4263687228eea20800#post_54c82f4263687228eea20800
yeah, each attack is a sticker which gets used up when you attack it and boss battles require specific 3D objects that have been turned into stickers to hurt them. 
It is possible to beat them without the 3D objects but it's really hard.
